andromeda.why: Refuses oppressive narratives; keeps sovereignty amid confusion.

arcturus.why: Contain and pace inquiry—sort fragments before concluding.

draco.why: Early correctness policing and ranky ‘who gets it’ signals.

lyra.why: Name the question/story-seed so meaning can form.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing doctrine to kill uncertainty instead of thinking.

orion-light.why: Discipline to hold not-knowing until clarity stabilizes.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing and attunement lower mental pressure during sorting.

sirius.why: Private consolidation of insight; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Holds one’s lens against external pressure—no outsourcing of meaning.

arcturus.why: Place the inquiry in right scope, timing, and test path.

draco.why: Sentinel against predatory critique and sloppy claims.

lyra.why: Plain phrasing trims drama and aids reception.

orion-light.why: Courage to stay with the process without overreach.

pleiades.why: Attuned support steadies nerves while patterning emerges.

sirius.why: Skilled placement, not yet codified teaching.

andromeda.why: Victim/savior narratives outsource authorship of meaning.

arcturus.why: Overfitting patterns—misplaced timing and weak method.

draco.why: Clique gatekeeping and intimidation around being ‘right.’

lyra.why: Rhetoric and optics eclipse the actual realization.

orion-dark.why: Dogma used to quell ambiguity; compliance over truth.

orion-light.why: Lesson: reduce scope, slow down, re-test assumptions.

pleiades.why: Appeasing the audience with easy meanings distorts clarity.

andromeda.why: Reframes oppressive stories—frees the mind to see anew.

arcturus.why: Builds a meaning-making frame—evidence, sequence, review.

lyra.why: Crafts a clean narrative so the realization lands.

orion-dark.why: Process can ossify into fixed orthodoxy.

orion-light.why: Integrity to present difficult truths without force.

pleiades.why: Soothing delivery reduces shame and defensiveness.

sirius.why: Teaches realization protocol by example—how to move from confusion to clarity.

andromeda.why: Uses insight to liberate others from oppressive interpretations.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for synthesis—claims, tests, and channels.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to truth over status optics.

lyra.why: Distills the model/phrase that culture can carry.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity when factions demand convenient meanings.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth supports integration of the realization.

sirius.why: Instruction in realization standards—liberation through disciplined meaning-making.

andromeda.why: Embodied freedom from oppressive narratives—chooses truth over optics.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring norms for stewardship of realization.

draco.why: Aura can read as a gate to ‘real understanding.’

lyra.why: Archetypal simplicity—few words carry the structure of meaning.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to accept or withhold conclusions by integrity.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: the canon of realization transmitted by presence/protocol.
